content: Constituency in SingaporeThis article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Khe Bong Constituency" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(December 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Khe Bong Constituency** was a constituency in Singapore. It existed from 1976 to 1988 and was absorbed into [Toa Payoh Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Toa_Payoh_Group_Representation_Constituency). It absorbed part of Kuo Chuan & Toa Payoh constituencies. ## History In 1988, the constituency was dissolved following the establishment of [Group representation constituency](/wiki/Group_representation_constituency) (GRC) and [Single Member Constituency](/wiki/Single_Member_Constituency) (SMC). ## Member of Parliament YearMemberParty**Formation****1976**Ho See Beng[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1980****1984**[Tang Guan Seng](/wiki/Tang_Guan_Seng)**Constituency abolished (1988)** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1970s [General Election 1976](/wiki/1976_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%±%[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)Ho See Beng10,95074.33[BS](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)Sim Say Chuan3,78225.67[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat) ### Elections in 1980s [General Election 1980](/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%±%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****Ho See Beng** **10,497** **72.42** **1.91** [BS](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)Sim Say Chuan3,99827.581.91[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)6,49944.84Total valid votes14,495Rejected ballots[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)15,425[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[General Election 1984](/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%±%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****[Tang Guan Seng](/wiki/Tang_Guan_Seng)** **9,221** **62.53** **9.89** [BS](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)Sim Say Chuan5,52537.479.89[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)3,69625.0619.78Total valid votes14,746Rejected ballots[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)15,7732.26[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold** This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub.
